synopsis.text:
As we delve into the three-part spin-off, "Another World," we are transported a decade into the future, witnessing events unfold through the eyes of an older Naomi. This anime serves as a prequel to the captivating film, "Hello World," offering viewers a deeper understanding of Naomi's story.

The first episode, "Record 2027," sets the stage, with subsequent episodes, "Record 2032" and "Record 2036," further unraveling the intricate narrative. Streamed on Hikari TV Channel+, each episode promises to be a thrilling journey.

At the heart of the story are two seemingly contrasting high school students, Naomi Katagaki and Ruri Ichigyou. Despite their stark differences, a shared love for reading ignites an unexpected bond. As Naomi uncovers Ruri's softer side beneath her cold and outspoken exterior, he finds himself falling for her.

Their blossoming relationship, however, is abruptly disrupted when Ruri is struck by lightning, leaving her in a coma. Determined to bring back her smile, Naomi embarks on a relentless quest to restore Ruri's everyday life.

"Another World" invites viewers to explore the depths of love, resilience, and the lengths one might go to protect their cherished bond. Prepare for an emotional rollercoaster that will leave you yearning for more.
